title: General Datafile Description - stages defined here apply to all description instances
description: Definitions for elements that appear in different stages of a wizard for submission to different repositories. 'ref', id of stage; 'title', header used for the stage; 'content', the function to call to generate stage html; items, actual form elements on the page; 'apply_to_all', if all items must have same value for this stage

properties.title: Repository
properties.message: Select the target repository for which this description is intended. The target repository choice helps inform the wizard on an appropriate metadata template for your description.

properties.title: Edit Datafiles
properties.message:
The Edit Datafiles stage presents datafile metadata as discrete attribute values, i.e., each attribute value captured in a column. You can modify specific attribute values for individual datafiles. Additionally, you can batch-update attribute values for groups of datafiles.
  • To update attribute value for a single datafile:
    1. Click to focus on a cell (note: this action is different from row selection)
    2. Double-click or press 'Enter' on a focused cell to make it editable
    3. Make your changes and double-click or press 'Enter' again to save your changes
  • To batch-update corresponding attribute values for a group of datafiles:
    1. Click to focus on a target cell, the value of which will be used to update corresponding cells of selected records
    2. Select one or more rows that will form the update batch
    3. Click the 'Update selected records' button
  • Click Next, when done editing, to proceed to the final stage
